result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Justin M. Kotolski

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Justin M. Kotolski
Current: 155 N. Jackson Street, Iola, WI 54945 United States  (Effective: 08-24-2017)
Prior: 403 Rainbow Lane, Apt. 1, Wausau, WI 54401 United States

Case called: 1:26 pm
Includes 15CF137, 15CM275, 15TR258.
Clerk: Kassidi
State appears by ADA Lesli Pluster.
Defendant appears in person and with Atty Dave Casey.
VRCW. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves to :
15CF137: Amend Ct. 1 (Disorderly Conduct-DA Repeater-DA) to Ct. 1 (Disorderly Conduct-DA).
15CM275: Ct. 1 (Operating While Revoked)>>DRI.
15TR258: Dismiss Count Outright. 
COURT GRANTS ABOVE.

PLEA: 15CF137: Ct. 1 (Disorderly Conduct-DA)>>NO CONTEST.
Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: Sentence W/H- 1 year probation. CONDITIONS: SAFE Program, Counseling as recommended, May have contact with victim C.H. at agent's discretion only, Full time employment/Full time schooling and when not engaged, must complete 10 hours Community Service, Court Costs, Domestic Abuse Surcharge.

Adjourned: 1:33 pm

Case called: 11:07 am
Clerk: Kassidi
Includes 15CF137 and 15CM275. 
Dft. Appears in custody.
Court questions Dft. RE: Employment/Income.
COURT advises defendant to set indigency hearing after employment status is confirmed as defendant is currently on a PO Hold. 
COURT does not appoint Counsel at this time.
Adj: 11:10 am

ADDRESS INFO for Justin M. Kotolski
Current: 403 Rainbow Lane, Apt. 1, Wausau, WI 54401 United States  (Effective: 02-13-2015)
Prior: 1004 Wianecki Road, Kronenwetter, WI 54455

Includes 15CF137 and 15CM275.   (15CM275) Shall not drive a motor vehicle without valid driver's license.  Contact Attic Correctional Services at 715-848-3202 on or before 3/09/15.   (13CF137) No contact with victim(s): C.H. (non-waivable).  Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.  Police escort to retrieve any personal belongings (Kronenwetter PD).  3rd party visitation through Family Resource Center.
